posts.content:
Without boring you with the detail I am putting my bus up for sale.

Some of you will be familiar with Maggie as she took pride of place on the turntable at the 2014 Volksworld Show. She was built by Larry Stockford at Retro Customs who has done an amazing job and the 6 year wait he has for resto/builds is testament to the quality of his work.

She is a truly stunning piece of art and it would cost you more in time and money than I am asking for her to build such a bus. The asking price is Â£35,000

This is a link to the article on her that was in the Sept magazine.

http://www.volksworld.com/wallpaper/197 ... alia-28447

If you would like any other pictures or information please contact me

philipjubb@ntlworld.com

07972634470
